actions

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForeseeableAction, FreeResourceAction, Scheduler, TakeResourceAction

    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Action is an abstract class representing an action to do in a scheduler.

    It contains the principles of the Action in our implementation of the pool problem.

    Author:
    Marine Bal & Alexandre Moevi & Theo Plockyn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Action()
      When the action is created, it is ready to be launched

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action()
        When the action is created, it is ready to be launched

    • Method Detail

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns:
        true if the Action is ready to be launched, false else.

      • isInProgress

        public boolean isInProgress()
        Returns:
        true if the action is not ready nor finished, false else.

      • isFinished

        public abstract boolean isFinished()
        Returns:
        true if the action is finished, false else.

      • doStep

        public void doStep()
            throws ActionFinishedException
        Do a step.
        Throws:
        ActionFinishedException - if the action tries to do a step while it is finished.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
